name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Is it nonsense that young people in China cannot afford houses?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The whole story of the Luoyang high school students' joint rights protection incident. The group has been disbanded. 
The response from the Municipal Education Bureau was to let the students not go to class on their own. If the school contacted them, they should say that they called the Education Bureau. 
After that, the Education Bureau's phone could no longer be reached.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Luoyang students added: Currently, except for the six key high schools in Luoyang, all other schools have announced a delay in opening, but around 10 a.m., some schools have temporarily notified students to voluntarily return to school.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The latest news: Six key high schools in Luoyang have announced that the start of the first and second year of high school will be delayed

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 2, students from Datong Middle School successfully protested. The school announced that the start of the school would be delayed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: [Click with caution] On October 1, a knife attack occurred at a jewelry counter in Beiguo Mall, Baoding City, Hebei Province. After the attack, the man calmly sat down and called the police to surrender.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
According to the contributor, the deceased was a colleague of the man's wife.
The man suspected his wife of cheating on him and went to the counter at work to look for her many times but to no avail. He suspected his colleague was protecting his wife, so he took revenge out of hatred.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At present, there is still no news about what happened in Guangzhou Haizhu Square last night. Some netizens said on social media that they were checked for ID cards when they passed by and were asked if they were locals. They questioned why he spoke Mandarin so well if he was a local.
